title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: When launching the Help view, I observe that I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas before it starts working (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame).
OB: Upon launching the Help view, the tab key does not respond or perform any action.
EB: The Help view should be initialized in a way that allows immediate navigation via the keyboard without the need to click on any 'live' areas.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Launch the Help view.
2. Observe that the tab key does not trigger any action.
